about_the_game:
Discord :

This is a game similar to Vampire Survivor.
You are a skeleton named Messi with just a skull and a body, but you want to be the richest, the most powerful and the kindest in this world.

In this game, you will experience:

1. Local multiplayer
You will be able to play with or against your friends, another skeleton C7, or others, you know.

2. Variety of bones
If you want to become stronger and faster, you must use the bones, which will give you hands and feet, and not only that, you can attach more bones to make your hands and feet longer.

3. Variety of gloves
As with bones, you can choose to pick up different gloves or shoes, and if you want them to increase your combat power, you need to control them through powerful bones.

4. Variety of monsters
You need to conquer these monsters. These monsters have different attributes, conquer them, you may gain more wealth or more power or better fame. Note: These monsters may be mixed with certain celebrities, you know.

5. Various bosses
You will encounter more powerful enemies who have bones and weapons just like you, some more powerful than you, but don't be afraid to defeat them.

6. Various armor and wings
Each time you pass the level, you will get a helmet or armor that can protect you, make you strong, and have wings that allow you to fly.

7. A variety of skills
In battle, you will have the opportunity to acquire and immediately use a variety of skills that pay homage to Mr. Toriyama's Dragon Ball.

8. Various weapons
During the battle, you will have access to a variety of weapons, cold or hot.

9. Various levels
Most levels are fixed, but if you get wings, they will make you fly and rise.

name: Skeleton Messi Demo

Minimum:
